title: Drawing, "Decorative Study; Verso: Two Head Studies", 1814–18
medium: Pen and ink over graphite on laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: 207, 1052. Inscribed under the temple: tempio di vesta Roma.  Inscribed under the sarcophagi: Pasolini Ravenna.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Four studies of sarcophagi; temple friezes; two studies of coffered ceilings.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Decorative Study; Verso: Two Head Studies", 1814–18.
1814–18. Pen and ink over graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2590.
